column4: does someone, if running 8.04 we will have later a 2.6.26 and up kernel ? I ask that because there is a native support for uvc drivers in those kernels.
kernel versions won't change in a given ubuntu release. hardy will always have a 2.6.24 kernel,
maybe the drivers get backported... and if you really need it you can still try to build your own (newer) kernel on hardy
